text: Billy Haddleton (born c. 1926) was a Canadian football player who played for the Toronto Argonauts. He won the Grey Cup with them in 1947.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=haddlbil001http://www.profootballarchives.com/1947irfutor.html ==References== Category:1920s births Category:Toronto Argonauts players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Canadian football quarterbacks Category:Canadian football running backs Category:Possibly living people
